CreatedAt.description: The date and time that the asset was initially submitted for ingest.

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the asset. You can get this from the response to any request to the asset.

PackagingConfigurationId.description: The ID of a packaging configuration that's applied to this asset.

Url.description: The URL that's used to request content from this endpoint.

EgressEndpoint.description: The playback endpoint for a packaging configuration on an asset.

description:
Creates an asset to ingest VOD content.

After it's created, the asset starts ingesting content and generates playback URLs for the packaging configurations associated with it. When ingest is complete, downstream devices use the appropriate URL to request VOD content from AWS Elemental MediaPackage .

EgressEndpoints.description: List of playback endpoints that are available for this asset.

Id.description: Unique identifier that you assign to the asset.

PackagingGroupId.description: The ID of the packaging group associated with this asset.

ResourceId.description: Unique identifier for this asset, as it's configured in the key provider service.

SourceArn.description: The ARN for the source content in Amazon S3.

SourceRoleArn.description: The ARN for the IAM role that provides AWS Elemental MediaPackage access to the Amazon S3 bucket where the source content is stored. Valid format: arn:aws:iam::{accountID}:role/{name}

Tags.description: The tags to assign to the asset.
